title: WooCommerce Phone Validator
name: woocommerce-phone-validator
description: Forces validation of WooCommerce phone field on checkout and billing address edit page
author: Preciousomonze

scripts.build: npm run uglify && npm run css && npm run makepot && npm run localzip
scripts.uglify: for f in $npm_package_assets_js_js; do file=${f%.js}; node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs $f -c -m -o $file.min.js $f; done
scripts.css: for f in $npm_package_assets_styles_css; do file=${f%.css}; node_modules/.bin/cleancss $f -o $file.min.css; done
scripts.makepot: wpi18n addtextdomain woo-phone-validator; wpi18n makepot --domain-path languages --pot-file woo-phone-validator.pot --type plugin --main-file wc-pv.php --exclude node_modules
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run compress-zip && npm run offload-zip
